verses.verse: And the famine <S%H7458><s%> was sore <S%H3515><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H834><s%> they had eaten up <S%H3615><s%> <S%H398><s%> <S%H853><s%> the corn <S%H7668><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they had brought <S%H935><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> their father <S%H1><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Go again, <S%H7725><s%> buy <S%H7666><s%> us a little <S%H4592><s%> food. <S%H400><s%>

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, saying, <S%H559><s%> The man <S%H376><s%> did solemnly protest <S%H5749><s%> <S%H5749><s%> unto us, saying, <S%H559><s%> Ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> my face, <S%H6440><s%> except <S%H1115><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%> be with <S%H854><s%> you.
If <S%H518><s%> thou wilt <S%H3426><s%> send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> our brother <S%H251><s%> with <S%H854><s%> us, we will go down <S%H3381><s%> and buy <S%H7666><s%> thee food: <S%H400><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> thou wilt not <S%H369><s%> send <S%H7971><s%> him, we will not <S%H3808><s%> go down: <S%H3381><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> us, Ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> my face, <S%H6440><s%> except <S%H1115><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%> be with <S%H854><s%> you.

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> dealt ye so ill <S%H7489><s%> with me, as to tell <S%H5046><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> whether ye had yet <S%H5750><s%> a brother? <S%H251><s%>

And they said, <S%H559><s%> The man <S%H376><s%> asked us straitly <S%H7592><s%> <S%H7592><s%> of our state, and of our kindred, <S%H4138><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Is your father <S%H1><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> alive? <S%H2416><s%> have <S%H3426><s%> ye another brother? <S%H251><s%> and we told <S%H5046><s%> him according to <S%H5921><s%> the tenor <S%H6310><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> words: <S%H1697><s%> could we certainly know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> he would say, <S%H559><s%> Bring your brother down? <S%H3381><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H251><s%>

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> Send <S%H7971><s%> the lad <S%H5288><s%> with <S%H854><s%> me, and we will arise <S%H6965><s%> and go; <S%H1980><s%> that we may live, <S%H2421><s%> and not <S%H3808><s%> die, <S%H4191><s%> both <S%H1571><s%> we, <S%H587><s%> and <S%H1571><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> and also <S%H1571><s%> our little ones. <S%H2945><s%>

I <S%H595><s%> will be surety <S%H6148><s%> for him; of my hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> shalt thou require <S%H1245><s%> him: if <S%H518><s%> I bring <S%H935><s%> him not <S%H3808><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee, and set <S%H3322><s%> him before <S%H6440><s%> thee, then let me bear the blame <S%H2398><s%> forever: <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> except <S%H3884><s%> we had lingered, <S%H4102><s%> surely <S%H3588><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> we had returned <S%H7725><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> second time. <S%H6471><s%>

And their father <S%H1><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, If <S%H518><s%> it must be so <S%H3651><s%> now, <S%H645><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> this; <S%H2063><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> of the best fruits <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2173><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> in your vessels, <S%H3627><s%> and carry down <S%H3381><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> a present, <S%H4503><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> balm, <S%H6875><s%> and a little <S%H4592><s%> honey, <S%H1706><s%> spices, <S%H5219><s%> and myrrh, <S%H3910><s%> nuts, <S%H992><s%> and almonds: <S%H8247><s%>

And take <S%H3947><s%> double <S%H4932><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> in your hand; <S%H3027><s%> and the money <S%H3701><s%> that was brought again <S%H7725><s%> in the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of your sacks, <S%H572><s%> carry it again <S%H7725><s%> in your hand; <S%H3027><s%> peradventure <S%H194><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> was an oversight: <S%H4870><s%>
Take <S%H3947><s%> also your brother, <S%H251><s%> and arise, <S%H6965><s%> go again <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the man: <S%H376><s%>

And God <S%H410><s%> Almighty <S%H7706><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> you mercy <S%H7356><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the man, <S%H376><s%> that he may send away <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> your other <S%H312><s%> brother, <S%H251><s%> and Benjamin. <S%H1144><s%> If <S%H834><s%> I <S%H589><s%> be bereaved <S%H7921><s%> of my children, I am bereaved. <S%H7921><s%>

And the men <S%H376><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H2063><s%> present, <S%H4503><s%> and they took <S%H3947><s%> double <S%H4932><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> in their hand, <S%H3027><s%> and Benjamin; <S%H1144><s%> and rose up, <S%H6965><s%> and went down <S%H3381><s%> to Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Joseph. <S%H3130><s%>

And when Joseph <S%H3130><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> with <S%H854><s%> them, he said <S%H559><s%> to the ruler of <S%H834><s%> <S%H5921><s%> his house, <S%H1004><s%> Bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> these men <S%H376><s%> home, <S%H1004><s%> and slay, <S%H2873><s%> <S%H2874><s%> and make ready; <S%H3559><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> these men <S%H376><s%> shall dine <S%H398><s%> with <S%H854><s%> me at noon. <S%H6672><s%>

And the man <S%H376><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as <S%H834><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> bade; <S%H559><s%> and the man <S%H376><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> into Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>

And the men <S%H376><s%> were afraid, <S%H3372><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they were brought <S%H935><s%> into Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> house; <S%H1004><s%> and they said, <S%H559><s%> Because of <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1697><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> that was returned <S%H7725><s%> in our sacks <S%H572><s%> at the first time <S%H8462><s%> are we <S%H587><s%> brought in; <S%H935><s%> that he may seek occasion <S%H1556><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> us, and fall <S%H5307><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> us, and take <S%H3947><s%> us for bondmen, <S%H5650><s%> and our asses. <S%H2543><s%>

And they came near <S%H5066><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the steward <S%H376><s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H5921><s%> of Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> and they communed <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H413><s%> him at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%>
And said, <S%H559><s%> O <S%H994><s%> sir, <S%H113><s%> we came indeed down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H3381><s%> at the first time <S%H8462><s%> to buy <S%H7666><s%> food: <S%H400><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> we came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the inn, <S%H4411><s%> that we opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H853><s%> our sacks, <S%H572><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> every man's <S%H376><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> was in the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of his sack, <S%H572><s%> our money <S%H3701><s%> in full weight: <S%H4948><s%> and we have brought it again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H853><s%> in our hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And other <S%H312><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> have we brought down <S%H3381><s%> in our hands <S%H3027><s%> to buy <S%H7666><s%> food: <S%H400><s%> we cannot <S%H3808><s%> tell <S%H3045><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> our money <S%H3701><s%> in our sacks. <S%H572><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Peace <S%H7965><s%> be to you, fear <S%H3372><s%> not: <S%H408><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and the God <S%H430><s%> of your father, <S%H1><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> you treasure <S%H4301><s%> in your sacks: <S%H572><s%> I had <S%H935><s%> your money. <S%H3701><s%> And he brought Simeon out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8095><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them.

And the man <S%H376><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> into Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them water, <S%H4325><s%> and they washed <S%H7364><s%> their feet; <S%H7272><s%> and he gave <S%H5414><s%> their asses <S%H2543><s%> provender. <S%H4554><s%>

And they made ready <S%H3559><s%> <S%H853><s%> the present <S%H4503><s%> against <S%H5704><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> came <S%H935><s%> at noon: <S%H6672><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they heard <S%H8085><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> they should eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

And when Joseph <S%H3130><s%> came <S%H935><s%> home, <S%H1004><s%> they brought <S%H935><s%> him <S%H853><s%> the present <S%H4503><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was in their hand <S%H3027><s%> into the house, <S%H1004><s%> and bowed themselves <S%H7812><s%> to him to the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And he asked <S%H7592><s%> them of their welfare, <S%H7965><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Is your father <S%H1><s%> well, <S%H7965><s%> the old man <S%H2205><s%> of whom <S%H834><s%> ye spoke? <S%H559><s%> Is he yet <S%H5750><s%> alive? <S%H2416><s%>

And they answered, <S%H559><s%> Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> our father <S%H1><s%> is in good health, <S%H7965><s%> he is yet <S%H5750><s%> alive. <S%H2416><s%> And they bowed down their heads, <S%H6915><s%> and made obeisance. <S%H7812><s%>

And he lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> <S%H853><s%> Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> his mother's <S%H517><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Is this <S%H2088><s%> your younger <S%H6996><s%> brother, <S%H251><s%> of whom <S%H834><s%> ye spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me? And he said, <S%H559><s%> God <S%H430><s%> be gracious <S%H2603><s%> unto thee, my son. <S%H1121><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> made haste; <S%H4116><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> his bowels <S%H7356><s%> did yearn <S%H3648><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> his brother: <S%H251><s%> and he sought <S%H1245><s%> where to weep; <S%H1058><s%> and he entered into <S%H935><s%> his chamber, <S%H2315><s%> and wept <S%H1058><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>
And he washed <S%H7364><s%> his face, <S%H6440><s%> and went out, <S%H3318><s%> and refrained himself, <S%H662><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Set on <S%H7760><s%> bread. <S%H3899><s%>

And they set on <S%H7760><s%> for him by himself, <S%H905><s%> and for them by themselves, <S%H905><s%> and for the Egyptians, <S%H4713><s%> which did eat <S%H398><s%> with <S%H854><s%> him, by themselves: <S%H905><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4713><s%> might <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the Hebrews; <S%H5680><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> unto the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%>

And they sat <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> according to his birthright, <S%H1062><s%> and the youngest <S%H6810><s%> according to his youth: <S%H6812><s%> and the men <S%H376><s%> marveled <S%H8539><s%> one <S%H376><s%> at <S%H413><s%> another. <S%H7453><s%>

And he took <S%H5375><s%> and sent messes <S%H4864><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him: but Benjamin's <S%H1144><s%> mess <S%H4864><s%> was five times so much as <S%H7235><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4864><s%> <S%H2568><s%> <S%H3027><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> of theirs. And they drank, <S%H8354><s%> and were merry <S%H7937><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him.
